content.question: The statement in lines 13-15 (“We both . . . alone”) highlights the idea that the friendship between the speaker and Lucasia

choices.label: allows them to enjoy individuality and connection simultaneously
presents complications that may cause them confusion
creates a temporary bond between them that changes over time
prevents the possibility of a future betrayal of their relationship

content.answer: allows them to enjoy individuality and connection simultaneously

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe how textual details reveal nuances and complexities in characters' relationships with one another.
